Talents.Name: Sufferer of Tribulations
Talents.Description: Continually loses HP over time (HP cannot drop to 0 as a result of this effect); When HP is above 50%, this unit gains Vigor, increasing ATK by 25%; this effect is doubled above 80% HP

Talents.Name: Herald of Revelations
Talents.Description: While this unit has no skill active, ASPD +27
